          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">A luci fioche</string>
            <string language="en">To dim lights</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zu den schwachen Lichtern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">À de faibles lumières</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Às luzes não ofuscantes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στα αμυδρά φώτα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">A las luces déviles</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Oscura la luce regolando la resistenza</string>
            <string language="en">Dim the light by regulate the resistance</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Oscurare</string>
            <string language="en">Dimming</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">abbassare la luce</string>
            <string language="en">dim regulate the light</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verdunkeln Sie das Licht regeln vorbei den 
Widerstand</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Obscurcissez la lumière règlent près la 
résistance</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escureça a luz regulam perto a resistência</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξασθενίστε το φως ρυθμίζει κοντά την αντίσταση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Amortigüe la luz cerca regulan la resistencia</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verdunkeln</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schwach regeln Sie das Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Obscurcir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">faible réglez la lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escurecer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">não ofuscante regule a luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξασθένιση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αμυδρός ρυθμίστε το φως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El amortiguar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">dévil regule la luz</string>
          </keyword>
